Interface IRobjectSnapshot

getPaintRect

java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D getPaintRect()
Returns a rectangle with equal height and width at the origin (0,0). This should go through an affine transorm to get the correct x and y.

Returns:
a rectangle with equal height and width at the origin (0,0).
